pages.title: Getting a Gate
pages.text: To get a gate, you will need to find the new `plinth` and `buried gate` structures.

pages.title: Plinth Structure
pages.text: The plinth structure is a new structure that can be found in the; overworld, nether, and end.

pages.title: Buried Gate Structure
pages.text: The buried gate structure is a new structure that can be found in deserts.
